pages.text: The $(d)Mantle of the Blessed Night$() is a unique set of robes that were worn by Ancient Keepers of the Flame. These robes grant the wearer the ability to summon clouds.
Using some Purified Cloth and a Blood Orb you can craft your own set of these ancient robes.

pages.title: Abilities
pages.text: The $(d)Mantle of the Blessed Night$() will grant its wearer Infinite Flight. Equipping the Mantle will summon a rideable cloud filled with the power of the Ancient Flame.
